Job Title: Python Developer

Location: United States

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Engineering, Information Technology

Description:
Python Developer - Remote, USA
About Hire Python:Hire Python is a premier software development company that specializes in Python programming to create innovative, scalable, and efficient software solutions. With a focus on delivering high-quality Python-based applications, we serve a diverse clientele across various industries in the United States. As we continue to grow and lead in Python development, we are seeking a skilled Python Developer to join our dynamic team. This full-time, remote position is open to candidates throughout the United States, offering flexible working hours between 9-5pm or 10-6pm. Hire Python is committed to both contract and regular employment options, focusing on finding the ideal match for our innovative projects and the successful candidate.
Your Role:As a Python Developer at Hire Python, you will play a crucial role in developing and enhancing our Python-based software applications. Your expertise in Python will enable you to build robust, scalable, and efficient backend services and applications. Collaborating closely with our team of developers, project managers, and designers, you will contribute to all phases of the software development lifecycle, from concept to deployment.
Key Responsibilities:Design, develop, and maintain efficient, reusable, and reliable Python code.Implement server-side logic and database solutions to ensure high performance and responsiveness to front-end requests.Integrate data storage solutions, including databases and key-value stores.Collaborate with the development team to define and implement application features and functionality.Identify bottlenecks and bugs, and devise solutions to mitigate and address these issues.Stay updated on the latest Python frameworks, libraries, and best practices.
Technical Requirements:Strong proficiency in Python, with a solid understanding of its ecosystems.Experience with Python web frameworks such as Django, Flask, or Pyramid.Familiarity with some ORM (Object Relational Mapper) libraries.Able to integrate multiple data sources and databases into one system.Understanding of the threading limitations of Python, and multi-process architecture.Basic understanding of front-end technologies, such as JavaScript, HTML5, and CSS3.Proficient understanding of code versioning tools, such as Git.Knowledge of user authentication and authorization between multiple systems, servers, and environments.
Experience:3+ years of professional experience as a Python Developer or similar role.Demonstrated experience in developing scalable and efficient software applications.Experience with cloud services (AWS, Azure, GCP) and container technologies (Docker, Kubernetes) is a plus.
Who You Are:A problem solver with excellent analytical skills and attention to detail.Capable of working independently and managing your workload effectively in a remote setting.Strong communication skills, capable of collaborating effectively with a distributed team.Passionate about technology and continuous learning, with a drive to stay ahead of the latest trends in Python development.
Join Us:At Hire Python, you'll be part of a leading company that values innovation, quality, and the transformative power of Python in software development. Enjoy the flexibility of remote work across the US, with standard working hours that support work-life balance. Here, we believe in empowering our employees to excel and innovate.

Experience Level (if available): None
